events.name: Critical minerals in lithium-ion batteries
events.wd_description: Critical minerals like cobalt and manganese play essential roles in lithium-ion batteries, influencing their performance, safety, and sustainability. However, their extraction and supply chains pose significant political, environmental, and social challenges.
events.description: Critical minerals like cobalt and manganese play essential roles in lithium-ion batteries, influencing their performance, safety, and sustainability. However, their extraction and supply chains pose significant political, environmental, and social challenges.

events.name: Cobalt
events.wd_description: Cobalt improves battery safety and energy density but comes with political, environmental, social, and governance risks due to its concentrated production in the DRC and control by Chinese investors.
events.description: Cobalt improves battery safety and energy density but comes with political, environmental, social, and governance risks due to its concentrated production in the DRC and control by Chinese investors.

events.name: Thermal stability
events.wd_description: Cobalt enhances the thermal stability of lithium-ion batteries, contributing to their safety.
events.description: Cobalt enhances the thermal stability of lithium-ion batteries, contributing to their safety.

events.name: Energy density
events.wd_description: Cobalt increases the energy density of lithium-ion batteries, extending their lifespan and capacity.
events.description: Cobalt increases the energy density of lithium-ion batteries, extending their lifespan and capacity.

events.name: Political risks
events.wd_description: The concentration of cobalt production in the DRC and control by Chinese investors introduce significant political risks.
events.description: The concentration of cobalt production in the DRC and control by Chinese investors introduce significant political risks.

events.name: DRC cobalt production
events.wd_description: Two-thirds of global cobalt production occurs in the DRC, a country with poor resource governance and unsafe artisanal mining practices.
events.description: Two-thirds of global cobalt production occurs in the DRC, a country with poor resource governance and unsafe artisanal mining practices.

events.name: Chinese control
events.wd_description: Chinese investors control 70 percent of the DRC's mining sector and refine 80 percent of global cobalt supply, adding to the political risk.
events.description: Chinese investors control 70 percent of the DRC's mining sector and refine 80 percent of global cobalt supply, adding to the political risk.

events.name: ESG risks
events.wd_description: Cobalt mining in the DRC is associated with environmental, social, and governance (ESG) reputational risks, including unsafe conditions and child labor.
events.description: Cobalt mining in the DRC is associated with environmental, social, and governance (ESG) reputational risks, including unsafe conditions and child labor.

events.name: Unsafe conditions
events.wd_description: Artisanal mining in the DRC often involves unsafe working conditions.
events.description: Artisanal mining in the DRC often involves unsafe working conditions.

events.name: Child labor
events.wd_description: The use of child labor in artisanal mining in the DRC poses significant social and governance risks.
events.description: The use of child labor in artisanal mining in the DRC poses significant social and governance risks.

events.name: Manganese
events.wd_description: Manganese is another critical mineral for lithium-ion batteries, primarily used in steelmaking. China controls 93 percent of global refining, leading to supply chain vulnerabilities.
events.description: Manganese is another critical mineral for lithium-ion batteries, primarily used in steelmaking. China controls 93 percent of global refining, leading to supply chain vulnerabilities.

events.name: Steelmaking
events.wd_description: Manganese is primarily used in steelmaking, accounting for roughly 90 percent of its total demand.
events.description: Manganese is primarily used in steelmaking, accounting for roughly 90 percent of its total demand.

events.name: Supply chain disruptions
events.wd_description: Power shortages in China disrupted the manganese supply chain, causing supply issues for European users.
events.description: Power shortages in China disrupted the manganese supply chain, causing supply issues for European users.

events.name: Supply chain optimization
events.wd_description: Optimizing existing technologies in line with supply chain realities can reduce the critical mineral intensity of lithium-ion batteries, focusing on reducing cobalt and graphite use.
events.description: Optimizing existing technologies in line with supply chain realities can reduce the critical mineral intensity of lithium-ion batteries, focusing on reducing cobalt and graphite use.

events.name: Cobalt reduction
events.wd_description: Reducing the cobalt content in lithium-ion batteries can mitigate some of the supply chain challenges and risks.
events.description: Reducing the cobalt content in lithium-ion batteries can mitigate some of the supply chain challenges and risks.

events.name: Graphite reduction
events.wd_description: Reducing the use of graphite in lithium-ion batteries can also help in addressing supply chain challenges.
events.description: Reducing the use of graphite in lithium-ion batteries can also help in addressing supply chain challenges.

events.name: New cathode materials
events.wd_description: New cathode materials, such as LG's NMC 811 and Ultium Cells' cathodes, aim to reduce the reliance on cobalt and other critical minerals in lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: New cathode materials, such as LG's NMC 811 and Ultium Cells' cathodes, aim to reduce the reliance on cobalt and other critical minerals in lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: NMC 811
events.wd_description: LG's NMC 811 cathode material contains eight parts nickel and one part each of cobalt and magnesium, reducing the reliance on cobalt.
events.description: LG's NMC 811 cathode material contains eight parts nickel and one part each of cobalt and magnesium, reducing the reliance on cobalt.

events.name: Ultium Cells
events.wd_description: Ultium Cells' cathodes, used in GM's EVs, further reduce the need for cobalt and magnesium with a composition of seventeen parts nickel to one part each of cobalt, magnesium, and aluminum.
events.description: Ultium Cells' cathodes, used in GM's EVs, further reduce the need for cobalt and magnesium with a composition of seventeen parts nickel to one part each of cobalt, magnesium, and aluminum.

events.name: Cobalt-free batteries
events.wd_description: Cobalt-free batteries, such as LFP (lithium-iron-phosphate) batteries, offer a less mineral-intensive alternative, though with reduced energy density.
events.description: Cobalt-free batteries, such as LFP (lithium-iron-phosphate) batteries, offer a less mineral-intensive alternative, though with reduced energy density.

events.name: Expansion of battery material inputs
events.wd_description: Expanding battery material inputs to include less environmentally intensive materials like salt, sulfur, silicon, or calcium can improve the sustainability of clean energy value chains.
events.description: Expanding battery material inputs to include less environmentally intensive materials like salt, sulfur, silicon, or calcium can improve the sustainability of clean energy value chains.

events.name: Alternative battery metals
events.wd_description: Materials such as salt, sulfur, silicon, and calcium can be integrated into the battery supply chain, reducing environmental impact and improving sustainability.
events.description: Materials such as salt, sulfur, silicon, and calcium can be integrated into the battery supply chain, reducing environmental impact and improving sustainability.

events.name: Sustainable mining practices
events.wd_description: Integrating best-in-class mining practices from countries like the United States, Canada, and Australia can enhance the sustainability credentials of battery mineral supply chains.
events.description: Integrating best-in-class mining practices from countries like the United States, Canada, and Australia can enhance the sustainability credentials of battery mineral supply chains.

events.name: US mining industry
events.wd_description: The US mining industry can provide sustainably mined minerals for battery production.
events.description: The US mining industry can provide sustainably mined minerals for battery production.
